channel.title: Shop Problem :S
channel.description:
hello,
I got This problem realy wierd I added an npc I added it into client.java [code]if(NPCID == 2899){ //Father Jonas xD PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 51; }[/code] well then i wanted to add items so i go to shops.cfg i did shop = 51 Father_Store 1052 1000 ect then i compile it says no problems we found so i ran my server i got this error i logged in and it says connecting lost... then i delete; shop = 51 father_store and i could login back please help me i realy want to fix this + how do i create then a shop?

item.title: Shop Problem :S
item.dc:creator: @Yodoxin Yodoxin
item.description:
@Yodoxin wrote:

In your shop you are using tabs between all of the numbers aren’t you? It has to go like so:

shop = 51-tab-Father_Store-tab-1052-tab-1000

Read full topic

item.description:

hello,

I got This problem realy wierd
I added an npc
I added it into client.java if(NPCID == 2899){ //Father Jonas xD PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 51; }
well then i wanted to add items so i go to shops.cfg
i did
shop = 51 Father_Store 1052 1000 ect then i compile it says no problems we found so i ran my server
i got this error i logged in and it says connecting lost… then i delete; shop = 51 father_store and i could login back please help me
i realy want to fix this + how do i create then a shop?
